interestingcomments.content:
Looking for specific focus attachment for camera /!/ So I’m clueless when it comes to finding attachments that do exist but not knowing how to explain or trying to lookup a specific name for things. 

Basically I use a RED One Mysterium X camera for recording church services & the biggest hassle is manually trying to focus the lens on specific people when we pan. I was hoping is someone could help me find, if possible, like an arm extension that has the same focus & zoom functionality or something I can map it to so it eliminates the need & time for going to the actual lens to change focus & such. It’s a very large lens & is almost arms length from the back of the camera to the focus wheel & very annoying trying to reach to it for a small detail fix. 

Thanks in advance! Hope I explained enough for it to make sense!
